display_long_description:
# **WELCOME TO SECURITY INC.**

Monitor every room through the security cameras. Stay sharp, you can never know whats hiding in the shadows!  Use your control panel to lock the door in camera view. But don’t forget to check the remaining power! You got this!

# **GOOD TO HAVE YOU ONBOARD — SIGN HERE**

[media]

# **IMMERSIVE ATMOSPHERE - BEWARE!**

Every sound, every movement on the screen is **CLOSER THAN YOU THINK!**
  **BEWARE**!

[media] 

Play through hand-crafted levels, each level offers a different playthrough experience.
Really dark and scary areas where you won’t survive without your flashlight!
Immersive sound effects that will give you chills at every step.

[media]

# **GAME MECHANICS**

This immersive solo horror game is scary, but also challenging! Try to survive through different areas and uncover the truth!
[media]
# **Skills required to work the night shift:**

- **Surveillance system:** use the arrow keys on the control panel to switch between cameras.

- **Door controls:** press the “lock door” button on the control panel to lock the room in view, press again to open. (locked doors drain system energy)

- **Camera control:** use the joystick to zoom and pan the camera.

- **Limited defense:** shoot enemies with your pistol (only 2 bullets provided to newbies)
[media]
- **Map awareness:** check the area map on your desk to learn more about your surroundings.

- **Flashlight survival:** always use your flashlight to reveal what may be hiding in the dark.

- **Endure the night:** survive until your shift ends.

# **Skills required to work the night shift:**

- **Surveillance system:** use the arrow keys on the control panel to switch between cameras.

- **Door controls:** press the “lock door” button on the control panel to lock the room in view, press again to open. (locked doors drain system energy)

- **Camera control:** use the joystick to zoom and pan the camera.

- **Limited defense:** shoot enemies with your pistol (only 2 bullets provided to newbies)

- **Map awareness:** check the area map on your desk to learn more about your surroundings.

- **Flashlight survival:** always use your flashlight to reveal what may be hiding in the dark.

- **Endure the night:** survive until your shift ends.
